description:
The Gyuuki Clan`s mansion sits atop Mount Nejireme, which forms the western boundary of the Nura Clan`s territory. They are said to manipulate, bewilder and draw in humans in order to kill them, and their clan emblem is the character for "Dread." Four hundred years ago, the Gyuuki Clan was one of the strongest warrior factions, and fought against the Nura Clan of the time.
Source: nurarihyonnomago.wikia.com
name: Gyuuki-gumi
